title: Why don't  set cuda device work ?
body_html:
If you have a question or would like help and support, please ask at our
forums.

If you are submitting a feature request, please preface the title with [feature request].
If you are submitting a bug report, please fill in the following details.

Issue description

I set model run only in cuda:0 by the code model.to("cuda:0),
but in fact the model run in cuda:0 and cuda:1 simultaneously,
I can not understand why?
or my code is error?
who can tell me some information about solve it?

Provide a short description.

Code example

+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Processes: GPU Memory |
| GPU PID Type Process name Usage |
|=============================================================================|
| 0 16016 C python3 517MiB |
| 0 20557 C python3 509MiB |
| 1 1384 G /usr/lib/xorg/Xorg 39MiB |
| 1 16016 C python3 717MiB |
| 1 20557 C python3 2289MiB |

if use_cuda_flag:
parameter.device = "cuda:0"
model = model.to(parameter.device)
